---
title: Code highlighting
format:
  html: default
  typst: default
---

```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE
)
```

Code in the chunk below is styled in both HTML and Typst output.

```{r}
x <- mean(1:10)
```

Code in @lst-1 is styled in HTML but not Typst output.

```{r}
#| lst-label: lst-1
#| lst-cap: A code listing.

x <- mean(1:10)
```
